description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Sydney, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Modern North West Sydney Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
hotels.description: Located in Macquarie Park, this contemporary hotel offers a prime location in Sydney’s Inner North West. Enjoy an onsite fitness centre, all-day eatery and the Macquarie Centre just minutes away with cinemas, ten-pin bowling and an ice-skating rink. This hotel is 20 minutes direct to the CBD via the new Metro line. Recharge in bright, stylish rooms before starting your day with breakfast at Bistro Dining. After exploring Sydney, sip on a drink at the bar or enjoy modern Australian cuisine. With Macquarie University and Lane Cove National Park nearby, this modern hotel is the perfect base for every traveller.

hotels.title: Sydney Waterfront Luxury on Manly Beach with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & A$50 Minibar Credit
hotels.description: Get a taste for life by the water at one of Australia’s most famous beaches with a heavenly stay at Manly Pacific Hotel Sydney - MGallery Collection - a beachfront hotel perfectly placed for you to immerse yourself in Manly's vibrant yet laidback atmosphere, less than a 30-minute journey from Circular Quay on one of Sydney's iconic ferries. Nestled between famous beaches on a stunning stretch of coast, Manly Pacific Hotel Sydney - MGallery Collection is your gateway to some of the best beach days, surfing and nature Sydney has to offer. Step outside the hotel’s doors and you’ll find yourself on the golden shores of the iconic Manly Beach. Wander along the esplanade towards Manly Wharf, take a dip at Shelly Beach, dive into the Queenscliff Rockpool, peruse Manly Markets 2095 or wind along coastal trails. Delight in exceptional within your oceanfront abode, including a rooftop pool, state-of-the-art fitness centre and French-inspired Bistro Manly, or simply retire to stylish, sophisticated rooms.

hotels.title: Sydney Elegance near Circular Quay & Opera House with Nightly Drinks & Daily A$50 Dining Credit
hotels.description: Discover new heights of luxury in the heart of Sydney with this five-star stay, located just minutes from iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House, Circular Quay and The Rocks. Set within a heritage-listed architectural masterpiece dating from 1856, Paradox Sydney offers guests an unrivalled central position and is a breezy walk from many of Sydney’s countless delights. Wander the idyllic lawns of the Royal Botanic Garden, peruse Pitt Street Mall’s celebrated upscale boutiques or head to Barangaroo, the city’s electrifying nightlife and entertainment precinct, for world-class bites and stunning views of the harbour. After days of discovery, return to the hotel for vintage opulence and contemporary comfort. The hotel’s exquisite, marble-backed lobby promises brilliance in abundance - experience world-class high tea and relax with a casual lunch or dinner at The Fax Bar or savour sophisticated plates at the acclaimed Bentley Restaurant & Bar.

hotels.title: Five-Star Shangri-La Glamour in the Heart of The Rocks Overlooking Iconic Sydney Sights
hotels.description: Stylish and central, Shangri-La Sydney puts the city's top attractions, high-end restaurants and upscale bars right at your fingertips. With one of the city’s most coveted addresses in The Rocks, steps from iconic Circular Quay, this five-star haven boasts sweeping views of Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge - the perfect introduction to magical Sydney. Part of the luxe Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts brand, this urban oasis offers outstanding facilities, including a beautiful lobby lounge, fine dining at Altitude Restaurant, late-night cocktails at Blu Bar on 36, plus restorative treatments at Chi, The Spa. Discover the undeniable charm of Sydney from this glamorous city retreat, effortlessly combining Shangri-La service with central convenience.

hotels.vendor_name: Sydney Harbour Hotel (formerly Rydges Sydney Harbour)
hotels.title: Sleek Stay in the Heart of The Rocks with Breathtaking Harbour Views from Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Find yourself among the cobblestone laneways of Sydney's oldest neighbourhood, The Rocks precinct, with this ideally located escape. The Sydney Harbour Hotel is your gateway to the city's world-class dining and entertainment options, with iconic landmarks within walking distance. Whether you want to explore the city or simply unwind by the rooftop pool and take in incredible 360° views over Sydney Harbour, this stylish hotel the place to do it.

hotels.title: Contemporary Mercure Manly Escape near Northern Beaches with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Leave the hustle of the city behind and retreat to this elegantly appointed property in Manly, perfectly positioned for soaking up the coastal sun and exploring the pristine Northern Beaches. Spend your days beach-hopping, swimming and surfing or indulge in some retail therapy at Warrinagh Mall, while the vibrant Sydney CBD is only a quick ferry ride away. After a day of exploration, return to the hotel's Distrikt Press cafe, offering all-day dining and dynamic spaces to sit, work or play. Later, relax and unwind in the aesthetic rooms and savour the tranquil charms of Manly with friends and family.

hotels.title: Sydney Five-Star Circular Quay Escape near Harbour Bridge
hotels.description: Be part of Sydney's iconic cityscape with a stay at the five-star InterContinental Sydney, located among one of the city's most prized landmarks. The hotel is set within the beautifully restored Treasury Building of 1851, and sits in the heart of Circular Quay, Sydney's buzzing tourism precinct and just moments from the Harbour Bridge and the Opera House. Discover an elevated experience at Aster, Sydney’s exclusive rooftop bar. Indulge in expansive harbour views, creative cocktails, artful small plates and highly-personalised service. Before setting out for a night on the town, stop in The Treasury Bar for a classic cocktail or indulge in a romantic dinner at Pont Dining Room. When it comes to leisure and culture, all bases are covered with an indoor heated swimming pool overlooking the Sydney Opera House, and a fine art gallery located on the ground floor.

hotels.title: Ultra-Sleek Sydney Darling Harbour Escape with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Explore Sydney's harbourside playground from Vibe Hotel Sydney Darling Harbour. Featuring a glamorous rooftop pool with sweeping city vistas and decadent poolside cabanas, this stylish hotel is the perfect base for city adventures, while remaining a zen haven in the heart of the bustling metropolis. Get your caffeine fix at casual onsite eatery The Sussex Store or head up to Above 319 to make the most of Sydney's year-round sunshine with a rooftop terrace espressotini.

hotels.title: Sydney CBD Escape near Hyde Park & Aquarium
hotels.description: Perfectly positioned within walking distance of the Sydney Opera House, the historic Rocks district and the stunning Royal Botanic Gardens, this hotel is your gateway to the city's most celebrated attractions. Savour local flavours with breakfast at the nearby Piccolo Me cafe, explore the vibrant nightlife or take a leisurely stroll along the picturesque harbour. The hotel's modern fitness centre and spacious rooms offer a tranquil retreat moments from SEA LIFE Sydney Aquarium and Hyde Park.

hotels.title: Iconic The Star Sydney Five-Star City Break with World-Class Entertainment and Dining
hotels.description: Sink into Sydney glamour with a five-star stay at The Star Grand Hotel, perfectly positioned in Pyrmont, the harbourside heart, where sweeping city views meet high-end dining and world-class entertainment. Take your tastebuds to new heights at one of The Star's award-winning restaurants - including mindblowing culinary odyssey Ele by Federico & Karl - catch a show at the Sydney Lyric Theatre, or head to G&Tea for ribbon sandwiches, high tea and one of the city's best gin and tonics.

hotels.title: The Rocks Heritage Escape with Sydney Harbour Views
hotels.description: Colonial influences and electrifying modernity effortlessly converge at the boutique Rendezvous Hotel Sydney The Rocks. Located in one of the country’s oldest and dearest downtown districts, this fabulously located hotel is flanked by the iconic Sydney Opera House, Circular Quay and Sydney Harbour Bridge. With its collection of historic terraces, studios and apartments, and some of the city's most breathtaking views, it's the perfect base to discover everything that makes Australia’s oldest city so special. Only a stone’s throw from Sydney’s buzzing CBD and a short walk from The Rocks’ abundance of shopping, dining and nightlife venues - with Luna Park and the heritage-listed Cockatoo Island only a short ferry hop away - Rendezvous Hotel Sydney The Rocks offers unparalleled convenience and heritage style, deep in the heart of the city.

hotels.title: Modern Apartment-Style Escape in the Heart of Sydney
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant city of Sydney and uncover the true beauty of this coastal metropolis with a stay at Rydges Darling Square Apartment Hotel, a trendy apartment-style retreat nestled in the heart of the city. Fill your days exploring the quintessential city highlights, with the awe-inspiring Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge only minutes away. Eat, drink, and laugh with family and friends at outstanding restaurants, offering inventive, exciting and multicultural dining experiences.

hotels.title: Five-Star Sydney Elegance near Opera House with Onsite Restaurants & Terrace Bar
hotels.description: Escape to a lavish city oasis in the heart of Sydney at this five-star haven. Well-known landmarks such as the Royal Botanic Garden Sydney, Sydney Harbour Bridge and Sydney Opera House are just moments away, while the heritage The Rocks and vibrant Darling Harbour, with its waterfront bars and shops, are also within easy reach. After a day of exploring the city, return to your sophisticated sanctuary and enjoy a delicious cocktail at the opulent Wentworth Bar. At night, embark on a culinary journey at the hotel’s exceptional dining venues - Tilda, offering refined Australian-inspired dishes and Delta Rue, where an exciting fusion of Vietnamese and French flavours delight.

hotels.title: Five-Star QT Sydney Escape near Iconic State Theatre
hotels.description: Modern-day design meets decades of tradition at the five-star QT Sydney, perfectly positioned in the heart of the city. This contemporary escape effortlessly blends urban vibes with a touch of 1920s theatrical flair in the form of the State Theatre, whose heritage structure houses part of the hotel. Indulge in a Little Italy-inspired steak at the acclaimed Gowings Bar and Grill before a show at the gilded theatre, and head out into the vibrant Sydney streets at night in search of after-show drinks - an easy feat with plenty of sophisticated restaurants and chic bars nearby.

hotels.vendor_name: The William Inglis Hotel - MGallery by Sofitel
hotels.title: Contemporary Sydney Warwick Farm Luxury with Day Spa & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Experience the charm of Sydney's South West with a stay at this luxurious hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of Warwick Farm. Just moments from the world-renowned Warwick Farm Racecourse, this charming retreat offers a unique blend of equine history and modern comforts. Explore the nearby attractions including the stunning Chipping Norton Lake and the bustling Liverpool City Centre. Return to the hotel to enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool before savouring the finest local produce at the onsite Newmarket Room restaurant, or enjoy a refreshing drink at the 1867 Lounge.

hotels.title: Sydney Adina Apartment Escape in the Heart of Darling Harbour
hotels.description: Tucked in the heart of Sydney’s brightest entertainment district, Adina Apartment Hotel Sydney Darling Harbour is the perfect base to explore everything that makes Sydney special. Only 20 minutes from Sydney International Airport and boasting spectacular harbourside views, the hotel is right next door to Darling Harbour’s dazzling array of world-class bars, restaurants, theatres and family-friendly attractions. With Wild Life Sydney Zoo and Sea Life Sydney Aquarium, the Powerhouse Museum, IMAX, Madame Tussauds, Sydney's bustling CBD and the International Convention & Exhibition Centre so close by, you’ll never run out of things to do and discover.

hotels.vendor_name: The Porter House Hotel Sydney - MGallery
hotels.title: Sydney CBD Heritage Retreat Near Hyde Park with Onsite Restaurants & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: The Porter House Hotel Sydney - MGallery Collection is a real gem in Sydney's crown, sitting in the heart of the CBD. Rich history meets modern elegance in rooms nothing short of magnificent, with plenty of natural light and paying homage to its heritage beginnings. The rooftop pool boasts stunning views, and you're in for a real treat at the sophisticated Dixson & Sons, serving up dishes to die for. Just a stone's throw from Sydney's best bits - embrace the lush expanse of Hyde Park, the world-famous Sydney Opera House and vibrant Darling Harbour. After days hitting the shops or taking in the sights, kick back in the swanky Spice Trader Bar with a signature cocktail.

hotels.title: Trendy North Sydney Escape with Heated Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Trace your way across the Sydney Harbour Bridge and fall in love with the stylish Vibe Hotel North Sydney. Only a five-minute walk from North Sydney station and surrounded by cafés, boutiques and world-class restaurants, the hotel has everything you need for the ultimate city break. Fuel up with eggs benedict and an espresso at the onsite eatery, Lobby Boy, hit the fitness centre or laze by the dazzling rooftop bar and savour sensational city views.

hotels.title: Contemporary Rydges Stay in the Heart of Sydney's CBD
hotels.description: Bask in the energy of Sydney's vibrant CBD with a stay at the modern Rydges World Square, an award-winning city gem that will put you right in the heart of it all. An abundance of restaurants, shops, trendy bars and iconic sights are within easy reach, and the hotel's modern facilities include a fully refurbished gym, the Amber restaurant and The Cidery Bar & Kitchen - making Rydges World Square the perfect place for an exciting city break.

hotels.title: Contemporary North Sydney Escape near CBD & Harbour Bridge
hotels.description: Step into the tranquil inner-city haven of North Sydney with a sophisticated stay at this tastefully curated abode, set mere moments from the bustling CBD. Be it work or play or just some family fun, take advantage of this hotel's strategic location and explore the Harbour City to its fullest with cultural icons, cute cafes and buzzing bars just a short walk or drive away. Choose to stay in utmost comfort at the property's well-appointed rooms and suites, featuring modern facilities and stunning Sydney skyline views. If you wish to venture out, cross the world-famous Harbour Bridge to discover Sydney Harbour and the Royal Botanic Gardens.

hotels.title: Sydney Glamour Overlooking Darling Harbour with Spa plus 9 Bars & Restaurants
hotels.description: Treat yourself to a coveted stay at Sydney's only Forbes five-star-rated hotel at The Darling, a boutique oasis overlooking Darling Harbour. With four restaurants serving the city's finest gastronomic fare, five glamourous bars, a rooftop pool and the prestigious Darling Spa onsite, this urban gem makes it difficult to leave. If you can peel yourself away, the iconic sights of Sydney, including the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, are on your doorstep.

hotels.title: Sydney Sofitel Luxury in the Heart of Darling Harbour with Four Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Embrace indulgence on the waterfront with a five-star stay in the heart of Sydney's Darling Harbour. Soak up the scenery from the sparkling infinity pool, unwind with holistic treatments at the onsite spa or savour seasonal local ingredients prepared in fine French style at Atelier by Sofitel. Toast to a night on the town at one of four hotel bars and return to sophisticated comfort at the end of the night. There’s no shortage of excitement in this thriving precinct and Sofitel Sydney Darling Harbour puts you right in the centre of the action.

hotels.title: Sydney Five-Star Glamour in the Heart of Double Bay with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Blessed with one of the city’s best addresses - in Double Bay just steps from an emerging dining and bar scene and the highly prized foreshore - the five-star InterContinental Sydney Double Bay, an IHG Hotel was made for coastal relaxation just 20 minutes from the city. Enjoy relaxed elegance at Stillery Bar and Dining, late-night cocktails at Rooftop Bar and Lounge, a fully equipped fitness area, and a rooftop pool boasting stunning views of the shimmering harbour.

hotels.title: Convenient Sydney Airport Stay with Onsite Restaurant & Airport Shuttle Service
hotels.description: Experience the convenience of this modern hotel, located just a short walk from the Sydney airport terminals. Offering the perfect launchpad for exploring Sydney's vibrant attractions (or comfortable stopover), indulge in a delicious breakfast at the onsite restaurant before heading out to discover the city's bustling CBD, iconic Sydney Opera House or the trendy eateries of Surry Hills. After a day of exploration, return to your stylish room for a restful night's sleep, ready for your next adventure or onward journey. Hassle-free shuttle services provided by the hotel will ensure that you never miss a flight (surcharges apply). A convenient stop in every way!

hotels.title: Contemporary Central Sydney CBD Escape with Onsite Brewery
hotels.description: There's central, and then there's Rydges Sydney Central, a stylish hotel just a stone’s throw from Sydney's main train station - offering connections to glittering Circular Quay, iconic Bondi and the Blue Mountains - and the best bits of the Harbour City. Perched in cosmopolitan Surry Hills, the bespoke hotel is surrounded by cafés serving specialty coffee and brilliant brunches, modern restaurants championing seasonal Aussie produce and every type of drinking den - from speakeasies to rooftops and everything in between. Though, you won’t have to go far for delicious fare: the hotel is home to Sydney Brewery, a craft brewery responsible for some of the city’s best beers. In the morning, pop down to the Manna Loft restaurant for breakfast and later, return for a few laps in the indoor pool or sweat it out in the gym or sauna.

hotels.title: Five-Star Sydney CBD Elegance Minutes from the Opera House & Circular Quay
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the refined elegance of Amora Hotel Jamison Sydney, where sophistication meets the allure of Sydney's renowned attractions. Savour seasonal delights at Croft Restaurant, unwind with a premium Australian wine in the sunlit ambience of Silo Bar or indulge in a handcrafted cocktail at Brooksy Bar. Enhance your wellbeing at Amora Spa and easily explore the iconic Opera House and Circular Quay, a mere stroll away from the hotel.

hotels.title: Contemporary Central Sydney Escape Moments from Pitt Street Mall & Darling Harbour
hotels.description: Experience the vibrancy of Sydney with a stay at this centrally located and stylish hotel. Perfectly positioned in the heart of the city, this stylish retreat is just steps from the bustling shopping precinct of Pitt Street Mall and the culinary delights of Chinatown. Enjoy the comforts of your modern room equipped with the sleek amenities. The nearby Darling Harbour, Sydney Opera House and Royal Botanic Garden are all within easy reach, offering endless opportunities for sightseeing.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Ovolo Sydney Harbourside Stay Five Minutes from the Sydney Opera House
hotels.description: Experience a luxury stay where 100-year-old heritage architecture, stunning design, and playful, art-filled interiors collide, at the award-winning Ovolo Woolloomooloo. Enjoy million-dollar harbourside views on the historic Finger Wharf, an ideal position a stone's throw from Sydney's most iconic sights. Relax by the indoor/outdoor jacuzzi and pool or indulge at the hotel's 100% plant-based restaurant, Alibi Bar & Kitchen.

hotels.title: Contemporary Mantra Chatswood Stay next to Westfield Shopping Precinct
hotels.description: Discover a stylish urban oasis perfectly positioned in Sydney's northeastern suburbs. Sitting directly opposite Westfield Chatswood, with over 250 stores including Myer, and Hoyts Cinemas, this hotel boasts easy access to Chatswood Transport Interchange while being just moments away from world-class boutiques and restaurants. The hotel offers fabulous facilities, including a shimmering indoor heated pool, a modern onsite restaurant and a fully equipped fitness centre. For a well-deserved drink after hours of shopping up a storm, the terrace beckons with uninterrupted vistas that stretch far into the horizon.

hotels.title: Contemporary Sydney Escape Just 20 Minutes from CBD with Onsite Cafe & Bar
hotels.description: Discover the best of Sydney from this contemporary escape, just 20 minutes from the city's bustling CBD. Venture out to explore renowned cultural attractions, including Darling Harbour, the Opera House, and Botanic Gardens, or keep in local with a stroll through the Macquarie University and Hospital campus. The nearby shopping precinct offers high-end boutiques by local designers, while neighbouring Macquarie Park provides a serene escape from Sydney's buzz. When the day winds down, retreat to the hotel for afternoon tea at Distrikt Press Cafe or a drink at the Mercure Restaurant Bar.

hotels.title: Boutique Sydney Glamour Minutes from Central Station
hotels.description: Discover Sydney’s best-kept secret with a stay at 202 Elizabeth, a boutique escape hidden behind closed doors and dripping with vivacious, Art Deco-inspired glamour - all just a six-minute walk from Central Station. Boasting just 38 bespoke, botanical-inspired and privacy-focused suites, the hotel offers everything you need to discover the best of the surrounding eclectic Surry Hills area and return to sun-kissed relaxation with a cocktail on the hotel’s spectacular rooftop.

hotels.title: Five-Star Potts Point Boutique Spicers Luxury near Sydney Botanic Gardens
hotels.description: Nowhere in Sydney is there better nightlife and buzzing local culture than in Potts Point, and at the five-star Spicers Potts Point, you can be in the heart of it all. The hotel is located within three 1880s Victorian terrace houses, boasting heritage character without forgoing the comforts of modern life. Expect marble fireplaces and classic staircases, as well as a cosy bar in the main common area and a relaxed dining room serving breakfast daily.

hotels.title: Contemporary Sydney CBD Self-Contained Escape with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the dynamic spirit of Sydney with a stylish self-contained stay in the heart of the CBD, moments from Darling Harbour. Offering easy access to the historic five-level Queen Victoria Building and the bustling Pitt Street Mall, the hotel acts as the perfect base for exploring the spectacular cultural icons of the Harbour City, like the Sydney Opera House and the Royal Botanic Gardens. Relax and unwind at your leisure in the well-appointed apartments or studios and tuck into a hearty continental breakfast at the onsite Cascades Restaurant & Bar. For the gourmands, Sydney's Spanish Quarter in Liverpool and Kent Street is abuzz with the best tapas and paella in the city while nearby Chinatown is a delight for trying exotic Vietnamese, Thai, Korean, Chinese and Japanese delicacies.

hotels.vendor_name: Novotel Sydney City Centre (formerly Mercure Wynyard)
hotels.title: Central Sydney Escape in Wynyard Precinct with Onsite Spa & British-Inspired Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant heart of Australia's most iconic city with a stay at Novotel Sydney City Centre. Perfectly positioned in the bustling CBD, you're just a stone's throw from the city's cultural treasures, including the historic Queen Victoria Building and the picturesque Darling Harbour, where you can enjoy waterfront dining and scenic views. The hotel's modern fitness centre and spacious rooms offer tranquil retreat moments from SEA LIFE Sydney Aquarium and Hyde Park. When hunger strikes, the finest British-inspired cuisine with an Australian flare at Birdie Bar & Brasserie awaits in the hotel lobby, where you can enjoy a delightful buffet breakfast, a leisurely lunch, or the convenience of in-room dining to suit your schedule.

hotels.title: Darling Harbour Heritage-Listed Apartments with Indoor Pool & Cafe
hotels.description: Discover heritage-listed charm at Oaks Sydney Goldsborough Suites, located in the heart of Sydney's vibrant Darling Harbour. This former working wool store turned chic retreat is a stone's throw from iconic attractions like the Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge. Savour the city's culinary delights at nearby Chinatown or re-energise with laps of the indoor pool. After a day of exploration, return to your suite, home to panoramic city views.

hotels.title: Modern Sydney Airport Stay Only 20 Minutes from CBD
hotels.description: Refresh and recharge at the Holiday Inn Express Sydney Airport, an IHG Hotel, a stylish retreat conveniently located at the doorstep to Sydney International Airport. Perfect for a seamless layover, or as your Sydney base, the hotel is just 20 minutes from the city's famed harbour, iconic Opera House and within close reach of the glittering Bondi Beach. Enjoy prime surf, renowned landmarks and gourmet dining all within close reach.

hotels.title: Stylish Sydney Art Deco Escape with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: A heritage hotel with Art Deco charm in the heart of the city, the Kimpton Margot Sydney offers a relaxing respite from the hustle and bustle of the urban streets. Explore new gastronomic experiences by savouring cocktails at The Wilmot Bar or indulging at the two onsite restaurants showcasing the talents of renowned Australian chef, Luke Mangan. Work up a sweat in the fitness centre or dive into the refreshing rooftop pool before returning to a spacious suite to rest and recover in style.

hotels.title: Sydney Hyatt Harbourside Elegance Overlooking the Opera House with Signature Dining & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Perched on the edge of Sydney Harbour, Park Hyatt Sydney offers front-row seats to Australia's most iconic view. Wake to sunlight dancing across the Sydney Opera House, then step onto the private rooftop terrace to catch the harbour's morning ballet of ferries and sailboats. When you're ready to explore, Sydney Harbour Bridge and Darling Harbour are on your doorstep. Dive into coastal Australian flavours at the two waterfront restaurants before cooling off with a dip in the rooftop pool - Sydney's most enviable swimming spot. After a day of adventures, the spa awaits to knead away your worries with treatments inspired by Australia's ancient healing traditions.

hotels.title: Central Sydney Escape in Darling Square Precinct with Indoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience contemporary inner-city Sydney luxury at this Darling Square stay, offering a temperature-controlled indoor pool and stunning views of the lush Chinese Garden of Friendship. Find yourself just moments away from the historic Capitol Theatre, twinkling Darling Harbour and the vibrant Chinatown. When hunger strikes, enjoy tasty bites and craft brews at the onsite Pumphouse Restaurant & Bar, or try new wine varietals at Ps Wine Cafe. With upscale restaurants, chic bars, the light rail, and the city’s iconic attractions all within easy reach, this hotel is your gateway to the best of Sydney.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn & Suites Sydney Bondi Junction
hotels.title: Sleek Sydney Escape Minutes from Bondi Beach
hotels.description: Discover a laidback side of Sydney with a beachy escape at Holiday Inn & Suites Sydney Bondi Junction, an IHG Hotel, nestled between lush Centennial Park and Bondi Beach. This end of the city is a shopper's paradise, an ocean-lover's dream and a foodie's heaven, with open-air markets, boutiques and streets bursting with cafes and decadent restaurants. Cherish the sunshine and the saltwater breeze as you explore one of Australia's most sought-after neighbourhoods.

hotels.title: Boutique Sydney Heritage Glamour in The Rocks with Two Eateries & Two Bars
hotels.description: Experience modern style and glamour in an iconic 1887 heritage Sydney building at one of the city's best addresses. Located in The Rocks precinct, a stone’s throw from high-end restaurants and upscale bars, the hotel is walking distance from the city's most iconic sites, including the Sydney Opera House and the Sydney Harbour Bridge. Harbour Rocks Hotel offers outstanding service and facilities, including a beautiful garden terrace, modern Middle Eastern plates at Tayim restaurant, delicious French fare at Creperie Suzette and tempting cocktails at Eric’s Bar. Discover the magic of Sydney from this glamorous city retreat, effortlessly combining old-world charm with modern luxury.

hotels.title: Contemporary Sydney CBD Apartment Escape with Stunning Rooftop Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Feel the vibrant pulse of Sydney with an ultra-comfortable apartment stay in the heart of CBD, a mere stone's throw away from Sydney Harbour, the Opera House and Circular Quay. Boasting self-contained New York-style studio apartments and penthouses, Sydney is yours for the taking from this stylish address, offering easy access to the city's world-class shopping, dining and entertainment districts. Go for a relaxing swim in the heated rooftop pool, admire the glittering skyline views and sip on classic cocktails at the New York-inspired bar and bistro, Georgie Wine Bar. With the best of Sydney at your doorstep, this escape is ideal for indulging in the Emerald City's eclectic atmosphere.

hotels.title: Boutique Cronulla Beachside Escape
hotels.description: Experience a beachside escape to the gorgeous Sutherland Shire and immerse yourself in scenic coastal charm with a stay at the boutique Rydges Cronulla Beachside. Perfectly positioned just 400 metres from Cronulla Beach, this laidback beach haven makes for a perfect escape just 45 minutes from Sydney city. Fresh décor, unique interiors and fantastic ocean views, a sparkling pool, and thoughtful details make for an exceptionally relaxing coastal retreat.

hotels.title: Luxurious Sydney Apartment Escape with Penthouse Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Amid all the excitement on offer in Sydney, find a moment of A-grade relaxation high above the pavement at A by Adina Sydney. Take in breathtaking panoramic views of one of Australia’s best cities from the comfort of the glorious indoor swimming pool, or while savouring a specialist cocktail at the top-floor 1950s-inspired dining and drinking destination, Dean & Nancy on 22. Experience this city of arts and culture from this ideal vantage point along the iconic George Street.

hotels.title: Central Sydney Stay 10 Minutes from the Opera House with Onsite Cafe, Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Feel like a Sydney-sider at Hotel Indigo Sydney Potts Point, an IHG Hotel. Located in the city's most eclectic neighbourhood, you're primed to explore the trendy boutiques and iconic sites, or take a leisurely stroll to the nearby Royal Botanic Garden. When you're not out discovering the city, sit back and relax at one of the onsite dining venues - savour a coffee and pastry at The X cafe or enjoy a cocktail as you discover the flavours of French-Japanese fusion at the chic Luc-San restaurant.

hotels.title: Central Sydney Swissôtel City Break with Outdoor Heated Pool & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: This sleek, five-star retreat right in the heart of Sydney is all about luxury with a fresh, contemporary edge. The architecture mixes sharp design and cosy sophistication, making it the ideal spot whether you’re in town for work or play. The rooms boast great views of the Sydney skyline, and the chic interiors throughout the hotel create a welcoming, upscale atmosphere. Don't miss out on the top amenities at Swissôtel Sydney: a rooftop pool that feels like your own private oasis, the Spa & Sport wellness centre where you can seriously unwind, and dining options at Ten Stories from oysters to wagyu beef that will make your taste buds sing. Location-wise, you couldn't ask for better. You'll be within a 30-minute stroll from the Sydney Opera House, Darling Harbour and the historic cobblestone streets of The Rocks. Plus, the Queen Victoria Building and Pitt Street Mall are practically on your doorstop for some top-tier shopping.

hotels.title: Landmark Five-Star Sydney Luxury in the Heart of the City with Two Restaurants, Bar & Tranquil Spa
hotels.description: A golden beacon of pure luxury emerging from a vibrant concrete jungle, Capella Sydney takes everything you know about city sojourning and elevates it. No stone lay unturned in the intricate design of this magnificent hotel, from the original sandstone facade that glimmers like gold in the sun, to the world-class wellness centre with a unique futuristic-meets-heritage appeal. Occupying an iconic corner in the heart of Australia's most beautiful city, this five-star retreat raises the standard for global luxury accommodation. Delight in the city's vibrant culture with a leisurely stroll to the nearby Rocks district, brimming with historic charm and gourmet eateries. Or choose to stay within the hotel and indulge in world-class dining at the signature restaurant, Brasserie 1930, sample scrumptious dishes in the presence of blooming florals at Aperture and finish chic city soirees by raising a glass of bubbles at the glamorous McRae Bar. Exuding luxury in all forms, Capella Sydney promises opulence and enjoyment in abundance.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Sydney Olympic Park Pullman Luxury with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the contagious energy of Sydney with a stay at this perfectly situated Pullman property, right in the heart of the city's sports and entertainment hub at Olympic Park. This luxury hotel offers a seamless blend of modern comforts and sophisticated style. Indulge in innovative Australian cuisine at the onsite Bacar Restaurant & Bar. Keep active at the state-of-the-art fitness centre or explore the surrounding area, home to world-class stadiums, lush parklands and a bustling dining scene. Just a short stroll away, discover the aquatic centre or venture further to Parramatta or into the Sydney CBD and the stunning Sydney Harbour.

hotels.title: Sydney Darling Harbour City Break with Rooftop Swimming Pool
hotels.description: It's all about location at the stylish Crowne Plaza Sydney Darling Harbour, an IHG Hotel, a mere five-minute walk to the iconic waterfront dining and entertainment precinct, Darling Harbour, QVB and neighbouring China Town. When you're not shopping and dining to your heart's content, unwind by the rooftop swimming pool or enjoy a gourmet dining experience at La Bella Trattoria and Bar or Two 88 Bar and Kitchen.

hotels.title: Luxurious Langham Sydney Harbourside Escape on Millers Point with Observatory Bar
hotels.description: Timeless elegance awaits at The Langham Sydney, a five-star sanctuary ideally positioned in Millers Point, Sydney's spectacular harbourside heart, within easy reach of The Rocks, Walsh Bay and Barangaroo. This acclaimed hotel boasts just 96 lavish rooms and suites, many offering views over the iconic Sydney skyline, and the exceptional Observatory Bar, serving delightful astronomy-inspired cocktails throughout the night.

hotels.title: Sydney Harbour Apartment Retreat with Waterfront Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Perfectly positioned in the vibrant Rocks district, this five-star apartment escape offers breathtaking views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge and Opera House. With the city's premier shopping district, Pitt Street Mall, just a short walk away, this hotel is the ultimate Sydney city stay. Savour gourmet cuisine at the harbourside restaurant and bar overlooking the Sydney Harbour Bridge, or take a leisurely stroll to the nearby Circular Quay for a plethora of wining and dining options. When you're ready to unwind, take some time to lounge by the onsite pool or hop into the relaxing sauna before retreating to your stylish apartment.

hotels.title: Heritage Sydney Sanctuary near Darling Harbour with Onsite Spanish Wine Bar
hotels.description: Step into the rich tapestry of Sydney's history with a stay at this heritage hotel, housed in a 19th-century wool store mere moments from Darling Harbour. Hotel Woolstore 1888, Sydney - Handwritten Collection's industrial chic aesthetic of exposed brick walls, recycled timber and vibrant street art pieces conjures a striking picture of the city's rich past. Head downstairs and indulge in the intimate surroundings of the onsite PERCY - Pyrmont's Spanish-learning neighbourhood wine bar - or wander across the footbridge that connects Pyrmont to the Barangaroo precinct to explore the endless harbourside dining and entertainment options. If you wish to explore more, Sydney’s iconic locales, including Circular Quay and the Sydney Opera House, are all located just across shimmering waves.

hotels.title: Contemporary Sydney Escape Overlooking Sydney Olympic Park with Onsite Dining & Bar
hotels.description: Located in the heart of Sydney's vibrant Olympic Park precinct, this property is the perfect base for exploring the city's renowned sporting and entertainment venues. Just a short stroll from ANZ Stadium and Qudos Bank Arena, the hotel offers a variety of dining options, including the Brewery Bar and Restaurant, serving craft beers and modern Australian cuisine. Dress down and call it a day in rooms that offer the best in comfort and relaxation, enjoy a meal with a view or alfresco dining at Boulevard Brasserie, or savour a drink or two at The Brewery. Take advantage of the Sydney Gateway and reach the airport in just 26 minutes or less! Convenience begins here.

hotels.title: Stylish Central Sydney Escape Adjacent to Capitol Theatre
hotels.description: Discover the many charms of New South Wales's capital city from the stylish Capitol Square Hotel Sydney - an urban retreat in the affluent precinct of Haymarket. This prime location places you within close reach of iconic Sydney sights such as the Harbour Bridge, Opera House and Botanic Gardens. Surrounded by an abundance of restaurants, shops and bars, and a short stroll from Chinatown, this hotel makes for the perfect place for an exciting city break.

hotels.title: Central Sydney CBD Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Trendy restaurants, leafy green parks and an iconic harbour - there's nowhere like Sydney's buzzing CBD, and Vibe Hotel Sydney places you in the heart of it all. Find yourself surrounded by the city's most prominent sites, including Hyde Park, Chinatown and Sydney Tower. When you're not exploring, make use of the hotel's rooftop swimming pool, bliss out in the steamy sauna, or head to the new Storehouse Sydney Central Café and Bar for barista-made coffee by day and cocktails by night.

hotels.vendor_name: The Sebel Quay West Suites Sydney
hotels.title: Sydney Harbour Self-Contained Apartments in The Rocks with Indoor Pool, Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Relax in cosmopolitan comfort at this hotel perfectly positioned in the heart of the Sydney's The Rocks. After a day exploring the historic district, nearby Circular Quary or the world-renowned Sydney Opera House, retreat to your spacious and self-contained apartment, complete with a fully equipped kitchen and breathtaking harbour views. Savour a refreshing dip in the glass-walled indoor pool, enjoy a workout in the state-of-the-art fitness centre or indulge in a sumptuous meal at the onsite Quartier Bistro & Bar.

hotels.title: Eco-Friendly Sydney Escape Overlooking Darling Harbour with Waterfront Restaurant & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant pulse of Sydney with a stay at this waterfront jewel. Perfectly positioned on the city's glittering waterfront, this chic hotel offers unrivalled access to the renowned Darling Harbour, home to a plethora of world-class restaurants, bars and entertainment venues. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or kick back with a chilled drink at the onsite Wine Bar, complete with dazzling views. As an environment-loving hotel, the menu of the onsite restaurant, The Ternary, honours sustainability without compromising on taste. The hotel's proximity to the Sydney Fish Market and the Australian National Maritime Museum makes it an ideal base for food lovers and history buffs alike. Harbour views, nearby brews and beautiful hues make this an absolute delight to escape to.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Sydney Macquarie Park
hotels.title: Sydney Macquarie Modern Escape with Grab & Go Breakfast Bar
hotels.description: Stay a stone's throw from Sydney when you use Holiday Inn Express Sydney Macquarie Park, an IHG Hotel, as your base for exploration. It's the best of both worlds: you can enjoy days spent in the CBD exploring the iconic Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge, and nights spent in peace away from the hustle and bustle. Enjoy meals in the Great Room dining area, or grab your breakfast to go before setting off on your discoveries, and make use of the 24-hour fitness area.

hotels.title: Boutique Sydney Heritage-Listed Escape in the heart of Haymarket with Stylish Wine Bar
hotels.description: Experience top-tier decadence and limitless luxury at this Art Deco-style sanctuary nestled in the heart of Sydney's Haymarket. Escape the hustle of the Harbour City and retreat to this chic hotel, housed within a striking Italian Renaissance building, and reflecting elegant touches of yesteryear glory with a modern twist. Complete with curated furnishings and custom-made beds, the stylish rooms invite relaxation. Relish delectable Italian dishes, exquisite cocktails and an impressive collection of wine at the intimate Bar Morris. Boasting a prime location along Pitt Street, the hotel serves as an ideal base to explore all the gems of Sydney, with boutiques, restaurants, the Harbour and Opera Bridge all a short walk away.

hotels.title: Modern Sydney CBD Break with Onsite Brewery, Rooftop Pool & Sauna
hotels.description: Delve into the heart of the city from this modern oasis, perfectly positioned within Sydney's bustling CBD. Just mere steps from Central Station, this contemporary abode is the ideal launchpad to explore the city's most iconic attractions, all in utmost comfort with all you could need at your fingertips. Explore the eclectic food scene in nearby Chinatown, stroll through the lush Royal Botanic Gardens or catch a show at the iconic Sydney Opera House. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's Platform 818 Restaurant & Bar for a sip and a bite, enjoy a refreshing drink at the Sydney Brewery, or relax your muscles with a dip in the heated rooftop pool overlooking the city skyline.

hotels.title: Coogee Beach Bliss Just 20 Minutes from Sydney CBD with Rooftop Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Take a few steps out of the door of Crowne Plaza Coogee Beach and you'll find yourself leaving footprints across Coogee Beach, one of Sydney's most beloved stretches of sand. Views of the pristine coastline are found at every turn in the hotel, whether from your private balcony or over breakfast at the effortlessly stylish Shutters restaurant. For fresh seafood and a cocktail before a rooftop pool swim, enjoy the relaxed ambience of Estate, which pays homage to America's west coast seaside bars.

hotels.title: Modern Parramatta Stay near Bustling Church Street with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Experience a stylish retreat with a sleek design and a warm, welcoming atmosphere at the Mercure Sydney Parramatta. Unwind from a daybed by the glistening 20-metre outdoor pool, break a sweat in the cutting-edge fitness centre and indulge in global culinary delights at the M Restaurant. End the night perfectly with a signature nightcap at M Bar & Terrace. Step outside and discover the best of Sydney's thriving 'second CBD', from the mix of local flavours along Church Street (also known as Eat Street), to the lush landscapes of Parramatta Park and the rich history of Old Government House. Grab a bike and cruise scenic the trails along the Parramatta River or head to the Lake Parramatta Reserve, a natural oasis with a designated swimming area.

hotels.vendor_name: Club Wyndham Sydney, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
hotels.title: Contemporary Surry Hills Escape Minutes from The Sydney Opera House and Lively Oxford Street
hotels.description: Your perfect Sydney escape starts at Club Wyndham Sydney, a boutique hotel near prime Australian landmarks including the Opera House and Darling Harbour. Position yourself minutes away from some of the best restaurants along with public transport that will connect you to the famous beaches of Bondi, Bronte and Coogee. Mingle with koalas and kangaroos at the Taronga Zoo before retreating to stylish comfortable rooms and unwinding at Club Wyndham's hotel gym.

hotels.title: Surry Hills Boutique Heritage Hotel with Rooftop Garden & Bespoke Art Collection
hotels.description: Discover boutique home-away-from-home comforts in Sydney's elegant Surry Hills. This meticulously restored heritage building is a stone's throw from the city's finest eateries, artisan bakeries and eclectic boutiques. Each room is a sanctuary of style, featuring curated artworks and bespoke furnishings. While here, help yourself to a tipple from the honour bar or ascend to the rooftop for panoramic views of the city skyline.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Hyde Park Hotel with Two Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Overlooking Hyde Park, this sophisticated Pullman retreat is just moments from the city's renowned shopping precincts, Darling Harbour and the iconic Sydney Opera House. Work up an appetite with a swim at the rooftop pool, or sweat it out at the onsite fitness centre and sauna. When it's time to refuel, savour innovative cuisine at the hotel's onsite restaurant, Windows on the Park, with verdant garden views, or sip a refreshing drink at Bar Thirty6 alongside a tapas-inspired grazing menu. When its time to venture out, pay a visit to the Art Gallery of New South Wales or take a leisurely stroll to the nearby Royal Botanic Gardens. Plus, with the vibrant Surry Hills and the nightlife of Oxford Street nearby, you'll be spoilt for choice with places explore.

hotels.title: Castle Hill Sydney Studios & Apartments near Norwest Business Park
hotels.description: Located in the heart of Sydney's Hills District, this retreat is perfectly positioned for both business and leisure travellers. This comfortable hotel is within easy reach of the vibrant Norwest Business Park and the shopping delights of Castle Towers. Foodies will love the nearby local eateries, while nature lovers can explore the serene beauty of the adjacent Bidjigal Reserve. The hotel also offers a state-of-the-art fitness centre, ensuring guests can maintain their wellness routine during their stay.

seo.title: Hoteles en Sydney - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Sydney, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
